replies.text:
The haughty patrician arrogance this tool embodies.
Sold for $4.75 million.  But mortgage rates are down.

GOP don't craft legislation. They break things, lie, steal taxpayer funds to give no-bid contracts to their friends, and project their own crimes onto others. Policy is anathema to Republicans. Talk trash, pop off, and refuse accountability for the wealthy, powerful, and their friends; That's gop.
Bessent is choking on the silver spoon he's had in his mouth since birth.

For anyone waiting for the mortgage rates to drop in order to buy a home, I can tell you that rates will not come down significantly until sometime in mid 2027, only if the K-shaped economy begins to turn upwards for working class Americans.
Underwriters are getting paranoid and loans won’t be made.

post_text:
In 2022, Erin Jackson became the first Black woman from any country to win gold in any individual event at the Winter Olympics.

Yesterday, she became the first Black woman to bear the flag for #TeamUSA at the Winter Olympics.

Congratulations Erin - keep making us proud!

#BlackHistoryMonth

Costs are already high, and this administration's terrible economic leadership is making it worse.
